commit.message:
8373696: AArch64: Refine post-call NOPs

Extend MOVK-based scheme to MOVK/MOVZ allowing to store 19 bits
of metadata.

Choose number of metadata slots in post-call NOP sequence between 1
and 2 depending on the offset from the CodeBlob header.

Additionally, implement ADR/ADRP-based metadata storage - that
provides 22 bits instead of 16 bits to store metadata. This can
be enabled via UsePostCallSequenceWithADRP option.

8373696: AArch64: C1: Embed FP constants into the main code

The constants section for C1 on AArch64 is only used for fp32/fp64
constants. Embed the values into the instruction section like for
the integers.

Use immediates where it doesn't require more memory than would have
been with the constants section. This is always the case for fp32.
Otherwise, use LDR + B skip_label + <int64>.

This removes the constants section - saving memory which otherwise
would be used for padding to align the entry point to CodeEntryAlignment.

Also, this enables further potential optimizations that require size of
the constants section to be known before code is emitted.
